title: Her Master's Madness
description: Forests were a mystical place. Dark or bright the people of the land knew to avoid them. For even the beautiful faerie folk of the woods were said to get up to mischief at times that cost daring explorers their life or limb. Yet within the bounds of the forests themselves lay depths that even the wood nymphs and fairies knew to avoid. Dark places, tainted by wrongdoing and ill-will that polluted the land.And so begins Her Master’s Madness. Lhea can’t help but be drawn into his intricate music and dark ways. Yet when the trap is sprung, does she truly pay the highest price?Warning! This dark fairy tale contains a twisted romance, domination, submission, and aspects of horror. A novella of over 23k words.
author: J.E. Keep
